project_abstract.cdata: The main objective of Coastal Lands Development Project is to increase and diversify production and incomes of farm families by assisting Jiangsu and Zhejiang provincial governments to develop coastal lowlands, mudflats and shoals for culture fisheries.  The project allows coastal dwellers to switch to culture fisheries from the over-exploited offshore fishing industry and to supplement their earnings with livestock and horticultural activities.  The project aims to (a) develop mariculture by constructing or improving about 10,100 ha of ponds for shrimp, eels and laver (edible seaweed); (b) support animal husbandry by providing breeding stock and on-farm improvements; (c) promote agriculture by establishing fruit and nut production bases; and (d) further the adoption of technological advances by constructing pilot plants to test new approaches in various fields of production and processing.  The project includes support facilities, such as feed mills, cold stores, processing plants and training centers and local and overseas training for technical and managerial staff and farmers.

P003525.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>沿海地区发展项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的主要目标是通过协助江苏和浙江两省政府开发沿海低洼地、潮间带和浅滩从事渔业养殖，增加农户产量和收入，实现生产和收入来源多样化。项目可促进沿海地区居民从过度开发的海洋渔业转向渔业养殖，通过畜牧和园艺活动补充其收入。项目内容包括：（1）通过新建或改造1.01万公顷虾、海鳗和紫菜养殖池塘发展海洋养殖业；（2）通过提供育种家畜和改造养殖场设施支持发展畜牧业；（3）通过建立水果和坚果生产基地促进农业发展；（4）通过建设试点工厂对新的生产和加工方法进行测试，进一步推动采用先进技术。项目将资助建设饲料厂、冷藏、加工厂和培训中心等配套设施，也将面向技术和管理人员以及养殖户开展国内和国际培训考察。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
